text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I've had an exhausting day, running<n>in and out of the
academy to prepare<n>for tomorrow's tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's going to be a big event, especially<n>for runners hoping to
get scouted. As I<n>walk home feeling nervous for<n>
tomorrow, I stumble upon a curious<n>sight.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm-hm-hm, hm-hm-hm! ♪<n>Hmm-hm-hm, hm-hm-hm-hmm!
♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She isn't dressed up or even holding<n>a mic—not to mention
the complete lack<n>of an audience.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite it all, she's pouring her heart<n>into singing and
dancing, almost<n>appearing to sparkle as the evening<n>sun
casts its light upon her.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I stop in my tracks to watch her—not<n>from fatigue, but from
the sheer charm<n>she exudes. Seeing her smile<n>somehow
fills me with energy, both<n>physically and mentally.
choice_data_list:
(You know what... Maybe I can get a little more
work done!)

(You know what... Maybe I can get a little more
work done!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though unable to stick around until<n>the end, I offer her a
round of<n>applause as thanks for her energizing<n>
performance.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day for tryouts finally arrives.<n>Excited to see what the
new batch of<n>racers will bring, I head to the<n>academy in
high spirits.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Voice, check. Air mic, check. Flyers,<n>check. Perfect! I think
I'm ready! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hi, everyooone! Sorry to keep you<n>waiting! It's me, Smart
Falcon! I hope I<n>make your hearts race today! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
It's time for Falco's special show, so<n>heeere we gooo!
First, I wanna hear<n>yo—

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Wait, waaaah?! You're the person<n>from yesterday!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: The Falco Fan Club's very first<n>member!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Woooow, what a coincidence! ☆ I<n>actually wanted to talk to
you!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But you left halfway through my<n>show, so I missed my
chance. I was<n>kinda sad you didn't watch 'til the<n>end, but
thanks for the applause! ☆

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Wha—Smart Falcon! You're holding<n>another one of your
flash concerts,<n>aren't you?!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Oops, she caught me again. ☆

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
This is the fifteenth time this month!<n>You're going to drive
me crazy with all<n>these "cute and sparkly" acts of<n>yours!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, um, looks like you've become a<n>fan! Thank you for your
support! ☆ But<n>I can't say I like that angry attitude! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
With that said, I gotta run! ♪ C'mon!<n>You're coming with
me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I have no idea what's going on.<n>Swept up in the moment, I
end up<n>following Smart Falcon.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: Hey! Come back here!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Phew... I think we lost her. Weshould be safe now. ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Geez, that was exhausting! ☆ Are you<n>okay? Thanks for
sticking with me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Let me reintroduce myself! My<n>name's Smart Falcon, and
I'm an<n>Umadol! You can call me Falco<n>though! ♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: An Umadol—an Umamusume idol! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Umadols run like normal<n>Umamusume... but they also inspire<n>
their audience during winning<n>concerts by shining
onstage—like an<n>idol!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
My dream is to become a top Umadol<n>one day. That's why
I'm doing what I<n>can to get my name out there every<n>day!
☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But well... I don't have a trainer at the<n>moment, so I don't
think I'll be racing<n>anytime soon, let alone holding<n>
concerts...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Wait... Hold on!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ummm... A-are you... like... uhhh... a<n>trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Whoooa!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yaaay! I guess my luck's finally<n>turned around!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Who would've thought my first fan<n>would turn out to be a
trainer?! What a<n>dramatic turn of events—perfect for an<n>
Umadol! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Okay, here's your contract! All you<n>need to do is sign!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, don't have a pen? That's fine! I<n>make sure to carry one
on me at all<n>times, along with a full contract! After<n>all, you
never know when you might<n>get scouted! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, she's going to make me<n>her trainer by force... I
should get to<n>know her before this goes any<n>further.
choice_data_list: Could I at least watch you run first?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Urk.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Y-you mean like... in a race? Like one<n>of the ones today?
choice_data_list: Yes. Are you participating in today's tryouts?
Yes. Are you participating in today's tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Um... yeah... Technically speaking...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Aw... I thought I'd be able to convince<n>you with just my
positive vibes...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Argh! Whatever! I can do this!<n>Raaaagh! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
All right, I'll run! But you have to<n>promise that you'll keep
your eyes on<n>me the whole time, got it? ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon seems to be trying a<n>little too hard to hype
herself up. Just<n>as I'm about to ask her why—

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: Get back here! Smaaart Faaalcooon!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, she's getting faster! Sorry, but<n>I gotta go now! See
ya later!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...In the end, I decide to see just how<n>well this
self-proclaimed Umadol will<n>run on the track.
